fields.title: Harris 1989 National Issues Survey, study no. 884030

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This survey focuses on Americans opinion about work, job opportunities, retirement, qualifications and skills, free time, health, finances, and reasons for stopping working .

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: National cross-section RRD telephone survey of Americans age 18 or older.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-884030;

distributor.distributorName: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science
